author: andschwa

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
Actually, this does not need to be done. The test for a non-existing file is equivalent to a test for a non-existing directory; since they're non-existing, there is no discernible difference in what is true about the link.

Further more, there already exists a test for symbolic link to an existing directory.

title: Add test for New-Item -ItemType SymbolicLink to directory
